result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel W. Ure was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse - Impairment of Physical Condition, Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Probation on counts 1&2 to run concurrent to each other as are the conditions thereof unless otherwise specified. The defendant shall pay Department of Correction fees as directed by the agent.  Defendant was ordered to report/make initial contact on or before 2-12-2016 to the probation and parole office.
Case 16CM35, misdeameanor bail jumping,  was dismissed and read-in to this case.
Concurrent with: Probation on counts 1&2 to run concurrent to each other as are the conditions thereof unless otherwise specified.

miscConds.notes:
Fine and/or costs to be paid on a schedule established by the agent.  

Defendant is ordered to pay the DNA surcharge, and to make arrangements to provide a DNA sample, within 48 hours, for testing through the Clark County Sheriff Department or if on probation, to the Department of Corrections as is required in all criminal convictions.
Defendant shall attend counseling, treatments, programming, evaluations as deemed appropriate by the agent releasing all records to the agent upon request

The defendant shall have no contact with S.H.  of any kind, whether direct or indirect, including in person, in writing, by phone, by e-mail or other electronic means, through a third party or in any other way.

timeConds.notes: Defendant granted huber privileges and is to report on or before 3-11-2016 at 6:30pm. Jail sentence applies to count 2 only.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Impairment of Physical Condition
